Title: Extends the expiration of Metro-North Commuter Railroad and Long Island Rail Road tickets purchased before or during the COVID-19 state of emergency
Summary: Extends the expiration of Metro-North Commuter Railroad tickets and Long Island Rail Road tickets purchased before or during the COVID-19 state of emergency for one year after the date of purchase.
LawCode: Add ยง1266-l, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to extending the expiration of Metro-North Commuter Railroad and Long Island Rail Road tickets purchased before or during the COVID-19 state of emergency
